original_text: Eat unleavened bread during those seven days; nothing with yeast in it is to be seen among you, nor shall any yeast be seen anywhere within your borders.
korean_text: 이레 동안에는 무교병을 먹고 유교병을 네게 보이지 아니하게 하며 네 땅에서 누룩을 네게 보이지 아니하게 하라

sentences.original_text: nothing with yeast in it is to be seen among you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 누룩 있는 것을 보이지 말라

sentences.original_text: nor shall any yeast be seen
